长期葡萄消耗可改善男性和女性的肌肉健康西部新英格兰大学（WNE）的一项新研究表明，长期葡萄消耗显着影响肌肉健康，对男性和女性都有显着的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/long-term grape-consumptight-shown-to-shown-to-improve-muscle-health-health-health-inhealth-in-both-men-men-and-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/long-term grape-consumptight-shown-to-shown-to-improve-muscle-health-health-health-in-both-in-both-men-and-men-and-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f32bbbb20-d7d5-4b6b-84b-84b-84b0-d30acbb2c2d3 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 11:21:32 -0500 Long-term grape consumption shown to improve muscle health in both men and women

CPRIT颁发了将近2300万美元的MD Anderson进行癌症研究项目德克萨斯大学医学博士安德森癌症中心今天获得了得克萨斯州癌症预防和研究所（CPRIT）的近2300万美元，以支持20个癌症研究项目，以提高发现，转化，临床和预防科学领域的新突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/cprit-awards-nearly-2423亿to-md-md-anderson-for-cancer-cancer-research-projects.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/cprit-awards-nearly-2423-million-to-md-anderson-for-cancer-cancer-research-projects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=987F79ED-19A5-4A4D-B533-B533-C5FB64C3904E Thu, 20 Feb 2025 09:21:19 -0500 CPRIT awards nearly $23 million to MD Anderson for cancer research projects

Vimseltinib获得FDA治疗Tenosynovial Giant细胞肿瘤的批准美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）已批准为罕见疾病的成年患者批准Vimseltinib（Romvimzatm），称为tenosynovial巨细胞肿瘤（TGCT）。 TGCT是将关节排列的组织的肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/vimseltinib-gains-fda-fda-approval-for-treating-tenosynovial-giant-cell-cell-tumor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/vimseltinib-gains-fda-fda-approval-for-treating-tenosynovial-giant-cell-cell-tumor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9428DAC-9ADD-407A-8DFC-9D71D71D71DC14906B Thu, 20 Feb 2025 09:02:06 -0500 Vimseltinib gains FDA approval for treating tenosynovial giant cell tumor
